unnormalised: Hey guys! Return policies, eh? Remember that saree I ordered online for Diwali? Turns out, the color wasn't quite right! Thankfully, the company had a hassle-free return. I hope all e-commerce sites in India are as accommodating. Eating biryani is easier than dealing with complicated returns, right? ðŸ˜„ A good policy builds trust, like the dependability of State Bank of India.
normalised: Hey guys! Return policies, eh? Remember that saree I ordered online for Diwali? Turns out, the color wasn't quite right! Thankfully, the company had a hassle-free return. I hope all e-commerce sites in India are as accommodating. Eating biryani is easier than dealing with complicated returns, right? A good policy builds trust, like the dependability of State Bank of India.
